title: Power Pages AI Chatbot
description: Designed and developed a Power Pages portal integrated with an LLM-based chatbot via custom APIs for a startup's pre-sales demo. Enabled intelligent Q&A and lead engagement automation, contributing to the client's successful product pitch and stakeholder buy-in.

title: Dataverse to Azure SQL Migration
description: Built a migration pipeline using Azure Data Factory and SQL scripts to sync 50K+ records, ensuring 99.9% data accuracy and reducing migration effort by 60%.

title: Bank Portal and Internal App Enhancement
description: Customized Dynamics 365 (MDA) and Power Pages with Liquid, JavaScript, and API integrations — improving citizen service response time by 40% and streamlining submission workflows.

title: Project Engineers Checklist Automation
description: Designed and deployed a Canvas App with integrated Power Automate flows, reducing manual checklist processing time by 70% for an energy sector client.

title: AI Image Content Generator
description: Built an n8n workflow integrating OpenAI GPT and image generation for automated branded social media content creation. Reduced manual creative work by 70% and ensured consistent brand voice across platforms.

title: Automated Invoice Generator
description: Built an n8n + Google Apps Script pipeline to process OCR-based timesheets, auto-generate invoices, and email them to finance. Cut processing time from ~2 hours/week to under 10 minutes.

title: POS to Excel Sales & Expense Tracker
description: Created Google Apps Script automations integrating an open-source POS system with Google Sheets, syncing daily sales, expenses, and payment types. Achieved 100% reduction in manual encoding for small retail businesses.

title: SME Technology Services Company – Power Platform Enhancements
description:
Power Apps | Power Automate | Business Process Automation

Delivered application enhancements and workflow optimizations within an existing Power Platform solution for a technology-focused SME. Responsibilities included: Implementing new feature requirements Fixing functional defects and logic issues Enhancing UI/UX components for improved usability Optimizing Power Automate flows to reduce manual effort Ensuring stability and alignment with business process needs The improvements increased operational efficiency and improved system reliability for internal users.
